introduction: A Western in the Czech Republic. Wayne, an imaginative but quiet student traveler, dreams of being a hero, specifically a cowboy. His girlfriend however, has other plans--or at least utter disdain for any of his. After a chance photograph catches a thief in the act, Wayne is pressured by his overbearing girlfriend to ignore the crime, but his compassion helps him gain the confidence to stand up for himself and the crime's victim.
